title: Exercise 2.3: Sum a Series
description: Use a for loop to generate a number series and compute its sum.

variants.title: Exercise 2.3: Sum a Series (C++)

tests.name: limit_five
tests.description: Limit 5 should list 1..5 and sum to 15

tests.name: limit_zero
tests.description: Non-positive limits print n/a and sum 0

hints: Read the limit once with std::cin >> limit; before printing anything.
Guard the non-positive case first so you can return or skip the normal loop.
When building the series string, track whether you need a space before the next number.
Use a running total (e.g., sum += current) inside the loop to compute the final Sum.
